## 

```{r}
data <- iris               # reads the dataset
parts = createDataPartition(data$Species, p = 0.8, list = F)
train = data[parts, ]
test = data[-parts, ]    
# train a model using our training data
model_adaboost <- boosting(Species~., data=train, boos=TRUE, mfinal=3)
summary(model_adaboost)

#use model to make predictions on test data
pred_test = predict(model_adaboost, test)

# Returns the prediction values of test data along with the confusion matrix
pred_test

accuracy_model
```
